---
imports: import { Link } from "@sparrowengg/twigs-react";
---

```jsx live play=link
<Link href="https://github.com/surveysparrow/twigs" target="_blank">Link</Link>
```


### Props

| Property        | Description                                              | Type                                 | Default      |
| --------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------ | ------------ |
| color | Used to set the color of the link | `default` \| `primary` \| `warning` \| `error` \| `success` | `default` |
| underline | Used to set the text decoration of the link | `none` \| `hover` \| `always` | `none` |
